statements: DELETE FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01' AND end_date > '2020-12-01';
DELETE FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19' AND location = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-73.935242 40.730610)') AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM InfectiousDiseases WHERE end_date < '2021-06-30') AND disease_name = 'Influenza';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 30
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM InfectiousDiseaseCases WHERE city = 'New York' AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE age > 40 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM infection_data WHERE detection_date < '2021-01-01' AND infection_type = 'COVID-19';
DELETE FROM Infections WHERE patient_id = 101 AND disease_id = 2;
